=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Mynena Bright Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Palette UV Glow Colorful Colors Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: Mynena Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mynena', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 5.16 x 0.79 inches; 9.88 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:914370ab89a7edd6f40118e2412a9b5d]] Boy, does this pallet shine!
It's probably one of the prettiest pallets I've gotten off Amazon yet.
The swatches were nice and bright.
The pallet came unbroken, and just looks so beautiful. Review Title: Shines Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Clipper Beard Trimmer Kit for Men,Cordless Hair Trimmer Mustache Trimmer Body Groomer Trimmer for Nose Ear Facial Hair with LED Display USB Rechargeable 5 In 1 8sanlione {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.77 x 1.18 inches; 1.12 Pounds'} Clippers work great. My husband was able to trim his hair and beard with ease. Battery lasted decently & I love that it comes with a wide range of accessories. Great Clippers STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） styleagal {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} I’m new to trying to do my own nails.
I really like all the accessories that came in this budget friendly kit. It worked great for my beginner skills. Beginner approved Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Qiray {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} These hair ties are too pretty to be hair ties, my daughter actually uses them more as bracelets because their too pretty. She loves the little "pearls" on them. She has worn them in her hair though and she has long semi-thick hair and they work great holding her hair up and together. Love these Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz. Mr. Pristine {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.5 x 2.36 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801825', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} This conditioner goes in smooth and washes out good, but my beard doesn't feel any smoother than it did beforehand, it is actually drying out my husbands beard. so so Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz. Mr. Pristine {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} This shampoo smells good, lathers good, and washes out good, but its actually drying my beard out. I even used it with the duo conditioner, & it just isn't for me. so so Acrylic Nail Powder Set Vcedas 24 Colors Acrylic Nail Art Tips UV Gel Carving Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Vcedas {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 1.3 Pounds'} These colors are so pretty. The packaging was nice. The glitter works as expected and looks so nice on the nails. Also, the containers are decent size so this should last me for a very long time Beautiful Rhinestone Padded Headband Bejewled Crystal Wide Velvet Hairband Sparkly Wedding Party Headband Hair Accessories For Women Girls (silver) MOLOCH {'Color': 'Silver', 'Material': 'Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'MOLOCH', 'Size': 'Small', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.42 x 1.57 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '783911261172'} This headband is really cute.
I got it for my 7 year old daughter, she is super girly and it doesn't get much more girly than this headband.
It is very pretty, and really well made, sparkles so much,.
It does fit my daughters head nicely, and the inside is soft, but I don't like how THICK the band is.
Regardless, it's still a good buy. Fashionable Padded Rhinestone Crystal Headbands For Women Girls Sparkly Colorful Bejewled Wide Velvet Hairband Party Headpiece Headwear Statement Hair Accessory (multicolor Rhinestone) FAERLIIRY {'Color': 'multi color', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'party', 'Material': 'Glass,Metal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Package Dimensions': '7.01 x 6.85 x 1.65 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SXDCE3421', 'UPC': '789615343381'} My 7 year loves this headband.
It's beautiful, and fits her head good.
Seems well made & I don't see any loose jewels, or stitching.
I don't like how thick it is though, it stands taller width wise on the head. Pretty Mynena Bright Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Palette UV Glow Colorful Colors Mynena {'Brand': 'Mynena', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 5.16 x 0.79 inches; 9.88 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:914370ab89a7edd6f40118e2412a9b5d]] Boy, does this pallet shine!
It's probably one of the prettiest pallets I've gotten off Amazon yet.
The swatches were nice and bright.
The pallet came unbroken, and just looks so beautiful. Shines
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Focus on Grooming and Style:** The user continues to prioritize personal grooming, showcasing an expanding interest in vibrant beauty products that enhance their personal style, reflective of their comprehensive beauty approach.

- **Convenience and Versatility:** Their preference for multifunctional tools persists, blending practicality and aesthetics in their grooming selections, indicating a desire for products that serve multiple purposes without compromising on style.

- **Quality and User Experience:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality products, evidenced by a recent acquisition that exceeded expectations for both durability and aesthetic appeal, as well as demonstrating a keen eye for products that stand out visually.

- **Broadened Product Range:** Exploration of beauty items now includes a diverse selection of makeup that emphasizes color and shine, suggesting a growing enthusiasm for versatile, eye-catching accessories suited for various occasions.

- **Critical Engagement:** The user remains constructively critical, offering balanced feedback that recognizes effective products while identifying areas for improvement, thereby enhancing their overall beauty experience.

- **Evolving Preferences:** Their interests are increasingly encompassing a wider array of beauty and fashion categories, reflecting a discerning taste for stylish solutions that elevate their grooming routine, particularly in the realm of colorful and dynamic beauty products. This evolution highlights an appreciation for items that combine fun with functionality.
